If only the pigeons, balloons, and all manner of strange objects could fly out of my hat without ever stopping, that would be perfect..."<br>"That would be a performance of magical power, not of magic tricks." '''The Curtain Never Falls on Magic''' is a Permanent [[Event]] released in [[Version 4.0]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* Permanently available after the Version 4.0 update

===Requirements===
* Reach [[Adventure Rank]] 25 or above

===Summary===
* Reach Adventure Rank 25 to invite "Elegance in the Shadows" [[Lynette]] ({{Anemo}}) from the event page!
* You can only win the reward for this event once. The event page will close once you have completed the challenge.

==Total Rewards==

|Lumidouce Bell = 3
|Meshing Gear = 3

}}
